title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Automated Formative Assessment Design for Evaluating Non-Declarative Knowledge

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level language domain knowledge and project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their project execution patterns relative to peer groups and assess tacit knowledge with 80% accuracy.
Learners perform self-reflection activities at least twice weekly using an automated comparative feedback system.
Learners revise project strategies at least three times to achieve top 25% performance relative to cohort averages.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
